sense.gloss: (spoken) line (in a play, film, comic, etc.), one's lines
stock phrase, set phrase, cliché, platitude

sdata.j: それは↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑台詞↑↓|せりふ|↓だよ！
sdata.e: That's MY line!

sdata.j: それはこっちの↑台詞↑↓|せりふ|↓だよ。
sdata.e: That's MY line!

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑週間↑↓しゅうかん↓で↑劇↑↓げき↓の|せりふ|を↑思↑↓おも↓えなければならない。
sdata.e: We had to learn the lines of the play in park.

sdata.e: Cue cards are used primarily on television to help the actors remember their lines.

sdata.e: Cue cards are used primarily on television to help the actors remember their lines.

sdata.j: その↑俳優↑↓はいゆう↓は↑舞台↑↓ぶたい↓で|せりふ|を↑忘↑↓わす↓れた。
sdata.e: The actor went onstage to deliver his lines.

sdata.j: その↑俳優↑↓はいゆう↓は|せりふ|を１↑行↑↓こう↓とばした。
sdata.e: The actor missed a line.

sdata.j: その↑女優↑↓じょゆう↓は|せりふ|を↑台↑↓だい↓なしにした。

sdata.e: Is there any good way to memorise our lines quickly?

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は|せりふ|を↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓↑暗記↑↓あんき↓できるように↑劇↑↓げき↓を↑声↑↓こえ↓に↑出↑↓だ↓して↑読↑↓よ↓んだ。
sdata.e: I read the play aloud so that I could memorize all the lines.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の|せりふ|は↑割↑↓わ↓り↑引↑↓び↓いて↑聞↑↓き↓いてよ。↑単↑↓たん↓に↑売↑↓う↓り↑言葉↑↓ことば↓に↑買↑↓か↓い↑言葉↑↓ことば↓というだけなんだから。
sdata.e: Don't let what he said get to you. He was just getting back at you for what you said.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はステージに↑出↑↓で↓る↑前↑↓まえ↓、１↑度↑↓ど↓↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の|せりふ|を↑復唱↑↓ふくしょう↓した。
sdata.e: He ran over her lines once before she went on stage.
